Name: William
Text: Banktania sure spent a lot of resources to get the finance region. We need to rescue their leader!.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: With her help, and the help of our advisor, I think we'll have a real chance at standing up to Banktania.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: I must head back to the Computer Science Region. I'll be meeting with Universities president to discuss the situation. Advisor, you and William are in charge of the Computer Science Army.

Name: William
Text: Alright Advisor, together nothing can stop us!.

Name: Kronk
Text: What? University forces? How did they get here?!?.

Name: Evil Bankman
Text: I.. I don't know sir. Maybe Redline was defeated?

Name: Kronk
Text: Grrrr! Take care of them! Kronk has important things to attend to at Kronk Manor.
